thread.title: Fortnite teases Nascar collab ahead of FNCS Global Championship - Dexerto

author: Anyka Pettigrew
title: Fortnite teases Nascar collab ahead of FNCS Global Championship - Dexerto
text:
Gaming
Fortnite Fortnite teases Nascar collab ahead of FNCS Global Championship Anyka Pettigrew ‚ùò Published: 2024-09-05T20:34:13 Epic Games/Dexerto The Fortnite Champion Series Global Championship begins the first weekend of September, and Epic Games has already indicated a Nascar collaboration is coming soon.
Held in Fort Worth, Texas on September 7-8, the FNCS Global Championship is an in-person tournament with a $200,000 prize for the winning team and a prize pool total of $2 million.
While most players have been swept up by the latest Chapter 5 Season 4 31.10 update , fans of Fortnite‚Äôs competitive side may be interested to know about an upcoming collab with one of the world‚Äôs most iconic auto racing organizations.
Article continues after ad Fortnite‚Äôs X account shared a post getting the audience hyped for the upcoming tournament, which also mentioned that Nascar was ‚Äúready to bring the energy‚Äù to it. This makes it sound like we‚Äôll get more information during the tournament.
A trusted Fortnite leaker presented more information in a quoted reply that revealed some important details about this long-awaited crossover.
Article continues after ad
NASCAR x Fortnite ü§î https://t.co/Mtd8SjYhpr pic.twitter.com/YbjIOWE3IG
‚Äî iFireMonkey (@iFireMonkey) September 5, 2024 According to the LinkedIn page of a Nascar employee, the company has plans to bring elements of the iconic brand into Fortnite through ‚Äúnew licensed Vehicles and new Rocket Racing Tracks.‚Äù
Article continues after ad That will likely mean new car skins for Rocket Racing, as well as Nascar cosmetics that you can use in the Battle Royale mode.
The leaked image provided also made it seem like Rocket League, also owned by Epic Games, will receive a similar Nascar collab.
This wouldn‚Äôt be the only time Fortnite has worked with companies to bring familiar cars to the Battle Royale mode. The Tesla Cybertruck arrived in the game just a few months ago.
Related: Fortnite Festival and Rocket Racing 23 January patch notes: New items, tracks & more Article continues after ad Players who love both franchises were ecstatic to hear about this news. In reply to another post talking about the Nascar crossover, someone said ‚Äúthat‚Äôs a crazy collab.‚Äù
Another commenter shared how hyped they were for this by simply telling Epic to ‚Äútake my money.‚Äù

She specializes in games such as Baldur's Gate, Diablo, and Valorant, amongst other games in genres such as RPGs, horror games, and farming sims. She was previously a writer for PC Invasion.
